Title.Language: Hymn After Praise of the Three Young Men

Text.Language: God eternal at all times / Sent His Angel to work great signs / Saved the youths from alleged crimes / Praise Him and exalt Him above all
الله الأزلى قبل الأدهار / ارسل ملاكه المختار / نجى الفتية من أتون النار / هوس إيروف آرى هوؤتشاسف
Nebuchadnezzar the king / Made a statue for worshiping / At the sound of the trumpeting / Praise Him and exalt Him above all
بختنصر الملك أقام صورة من ذهب / وقال للوزراء وكل الشعب / إذا ما سمعتم آلات الطرب / هوس إيروف آرى هوؤتشاسف
All must come out and fall down / From all cities and every town / To worship him who wears the crown / Praise Him and exalt Him above all
تعالوا لوقتكم مسرعين / ولتلك الصورة ساجدين / وإذا لم تسجدوا تلقون فى الآتون / هوس إيروف آرى هوؤتشاسف
Chaldeans also came out / Worshiped at the sound of the shout / But the three youths remained devout / Praise Him and exalt Him above all
تقدم الكلدانيون / لتلك الصورة خروا ساجدين / ماخلا الثلاثة الفتية القديسين / هوس إيروف آرى هوؤتشاسف
Hananiah come and praise / With your heart and soul set ablaze / For your Messiah does amaze / Praise Him and exalt Him above all
تعال إلينا ياأنانياس / ورتل معنا بصوت الخلاص / وسبح إلهك ماسياس / هوس إيروف آرى هوؤتشاسف
Men came and informed the king / There are three men not worshiping / To disobedience they cling / Praise Him and exalt Him above all
جاء قوم وأعلموا الملك قائلين / هاهنا ثلاثة رجال ساكنين / لم يسجدوا للصورة بل مهملين / هوس إيروف آرى هوؤتشاسف
The king gathered the leaders / And discussed with his counselors / What to do with unbelievers / Praise Him and exalt Him above all
جمع الملك رؤساء الشعب / وأرباب الدولة وكل الرتب / وقال لهم أوقدوا الأتون بالحطب / هوس إيروف آرى هوؤتشاسف
The hands of the youths they bound / And cast them on the furnace ground / But they felt dew not heat around / Praise Him and exalt Him above all
أتوا بالفتية موثقين / وطرحوهم فى وسط الأتون / فصار كندى اليسمين / هوس إيروف آرى هوؤتشاسف
The Angel of the Lord came / And quenched the furnace and its flame / With rejoicing they all proclaimed / Praise Him and exalt Him above all
حينئذ ملاك الله جاءهم / أطفأ الأتون وقواهم / وفرحوا به لما أتاهم / هوس إيروف آرى هوؤتشاسف
Azariah praised and prayed / The Trinity’s might was displayed / He worshiped and was not afraid / Praise Him and exalt Him above all
حينئذ صلى عزارياس / صلاة قوية بغير أدناس / تى اوأوإن إتجوم إن تى اترياس / هوس إيروف آرى هوؤتشاسف
Mishael likewise did tell / Before God’s glory they all fell / To bless the Lord Immanuel / Praise Him and exalt Him above all
خاصة بالأكثر ميصائيل / علَّ صوته بالتهليل / اسمو إإ فران إن إممانوئيل / هوس إيروف آرى هوؤتشاسف
The king was vexed and amazed / For there were three men set ablaze / But now four unbound freely praised / Praise Him and exalt Him above all
دهش الملك أيضاً واحتار / أليس ثلاثة ألقوا فى النار / هوذا أربعة يمشون أجهار / هوس إيروف آرى هوؤتشاسف
The king was surprised to see / Four men walking unbound and free / Praising their God the Almighty / Praise Him and exalt Him above all
رأى الملك حقاً اجهار / أربعة رجال يمشون فى النار / ويسبحون ببهجة ووقار / هوس إيروف آرى هوؤتشاسف
The king thought this was so odd / The sight was real and not a fraud / The fourth looked like the Son of God / Praise Him and exalt Him above all
زاد عجباً ونطق بفاه / هوذا الرابع يشبه ابن الآلهة / فى منظره وفى رؤياه / هوس إيروف آرى هوؤتشاسف
Praise our God O you people / For there is none who is equal / More powerful than all evil / Praise Him and exalt Him above all
سبحوه أيها السادات / الملائكة والكراسى والقوات / سبحوا رب السموات / هوس إيروف آرى هوؤتشاسف
Praise Him and glorify Him / In the assemblies exalt Him / Above all the elders bless Him / Praise Him and exalt Him above all
سبحوه ومجدوه / فى كنائس شعبه ارفعوه / على منابر الشيوخ باركوه / هوس إيروف آرى هوؤتشاسف
Praise your God O you Shadrach / Abed-Nego and praised Meshach / From the furnace did not draw back / Praise Him and exalt Him above all
سبح إلهك ياسدراك / وابدناغو والممدوح ميساك / لأنه نجاكم من الهلاك / هوس إيروف آرى هوؤتشاسف
Slaves and free from all nations / Praise the Lord in jubilation / He saved you from annihilation / Praise Him and exalt Him above all
سبحوه ياجميع الامم / الأحرار والعبيد والخدم / لأنه أنشاكم من العدم / هوس إيروف آرى هوؤتشاسف
The furnace O Hananiah / Was quenched by God the Messiah / Bless the Alpha and Omega / Praise Him and exalt Him above all
سعير اللهيب ياأنانياس / أطفأه إلهك ماسياس / إسموا إبيفران توديمياس / هوس إيروف آرى هوؤتشاسف
The youths praised with rejoicing / The God of Israel blessing / From age to age remembering / Praise Him and exalt Him above all
صاح الفتية بالتهليل / باركوا الرب إله اسرائيل / وإذكروا اسمه من جيل إلى جيل / هوس إيروف آرى هوؤتشاسف
Burnt offerings did not suffice / You purchased our souls at a price / O undefiled Sacrifice / Praise Him and exalt Him above all
تقدمة قربت بغير أدناس / أيها الممدوح عزارياس / إسمو إإفران توديمياس / هوس إيروف آرى هوؤتشاسف
The Lord God quenched the furnace / Rejoice and praise in steadfastness / Offer to God all righteousness / Praise Him and exalt Him above all
أخمد اللهيب عمانوئيل / فسر وسبح ياميصائيل / ورتل لإلهك بالتهليل / هوس إيروف آرى هوؤتشاسف
The three youths praised with glory / And they all proclaimed joyfully / The beloved Son is holy / Praise Him and exalt Him above all
ظهر الفتية بالتمجيد / ورتلوا بصوت عالى شديد / إفؤاب إبشيرى إم مينريت / هوس إيروف آرى هوؤتشاسف
Nebuchadnezzar did not acquit / Seven times more the furnace lit / But the three youths did not fear it / Praise Him and exalt Him above all
علا اللهيب فوق الأتون / تسعة وأربعين ذراعاً كاملين / ولم يرهبه المجاهدون / هوس إيروف آرى هوؤتشاسف
The three youths were not ablaze / From the furnace they offered praise / Defeating the devil always / Praise Him and exalt Him above all
غلب الفتية لهيب النار / وقهروا الاعداء الكفار / فاستحقوا المديح والتذكار / هوس إيروف آرى هوؤتشاسف
The king said Hananiah / Mishael and Azariah / Are servants of the Messiah / Praise Him and exalt Him above all
فصاح الملك بصوت عال / حنانيا وعزاريا وميصائيل / عبيد الله القوى المتعال / هوس إيروف آرى هوؤتشاسف
From the furnace come out now / To your God every knee shall bow / He saved them we do not know how / Praise Him and exalt Him above all
تعالوا اخرجوا من النار / لأن إلهكم ذو إقتدار / صانع العجائب الكبار / هوس إيروف آرى هوؤتشاسف
Give glory O Israel / Also the great prophet Daniel / Offer before Immanuel / Praise Him and exalt Him above all
كرامة ومجداً يا اسرائيل / قدم لإلهك عمانوئيل / تسابيح البركة والتهليل / هوس إيروف آرى هوؤتشاسف
We worship our God today / In all the world we join and pray / Praising the Lord in every way / Praise Him and exalt Him above all
له تسجد كل الاسباط / وكل الألسن واللغات / تسبح رب القوات / هوس إيروف آرى هوؤتشاسف
No other God is like You / Your eternal kingdom is true / Glory and honor befit You / Praise Him and exalt Him above all
من يشبهك يارب الأرباب / إله قوى عزيز مهاب / سلطانك فى كل الأحقاب / هوس إيروف آرى هوؤتشاسف
The furnace became cool mist / As though fire did not exist / Christ our God entered their midst / Praise Him and exalt Him above all
ندى بارد صار الأتون / فصاح الفتية بصوت حنون / إسمو إإبشويس تون كيريون / هوس إيروف آرى هوؤتشاسف
Rejoice in the Lord always / The God of Jacob we all praise / Let us exalt Him all our days / Praise Him and exalt Him above all
هللوا لإله يعقوب / وابتهجوا بالله القوى المرهوب / ورتلوا لإسمه المحبوب / هوس إيروف آرى هوؤتشاسف
Praise Him also with these rhymes / For His many wonders and signs / Praise our Lord God at all times / Praise Him and exalt Him above all
وسبحوه أيضاً بالألحان / باركوا الرب أيها الفتيان / إفهوس إإفنوتى ان سيو نيفين / هوس إيروف آرى هوؤتشاسف
The Lord our God is honored / His enemies He has scattered / The three youths He has delivered / Praise Him and exalt Him above all
لأنه عظيم ومبارك جدا / ومخوف على كل الآلهة / بقدرته نجى الفتية / هوس إيروف آرى هوؤتشاسف
To Him is due all glory / The Lord our God of all mercy / Praise Him in His sanctuary / Praise Him and exalt Him above all
يليق الإكرام والسجود / بالإله الخالق المعبود / رب الأحسان مصدر الجود / هوس إيروف آرى هوؤتشاسف

Title.Language: Another Hymn After Praise of the Three Young Men

Text.Language: Bless the God of Israel / O Hananiah, Azariah, and Mishael / Who at all times, comforts and heals / Praise Him and exalt Him above all.
King Nebuchadnezzar of Babylon / conquered Israel, his might was shown / and brought young men to Chaldean / Praise Him and exalt Him above all.
Hananiah, Azariah, and Mishael / also the great prophet, Daniel / were brought from the land of Israel / Praise Him and exalt Him above all.
To his palace, ordered the king / the young men, his servants will bring / to be raised Chaldeans in everything / Praise Him and exalt Him above all.
Even the Jewish names had to go / new names on them, they did bestow / Shadrach, Meshach, and Abed-Nego / Praise Him and exalt Him above all.
They served the king with honesty / their wisdom was the best in the city / their goal was heaven and eternity / Praise Him and exalt Him above all.
They would not eat from the idol’s meat / beans and vegetables only, did they eat / they were healthy, handsome and neat / Praise Him and exalt Him above all.
The king then made and image of gold / everyone will worship, they were told / to his orders, all nations will hold / Praise Him and exalt Him above all.
Those who will not worship him now / will be tormented; to know how / to get down, on their knees and bow / Praise Him and exalt Him above all.
All to the king's orders will obey / for the laws of the land, he lays / what people follow, is what he says / Praise Him and exalt Him above all.
The Chaldeans came and fell down / from every city and every town / to worship the bearer of the crown / Praise Him and exalt Him above all.
The three young men were strong and bold / our faith in the Lord will not be sold / our religion, we will uphold / Praise Him and exalt Him above all.
The Chaldeans with them were upset / and said their heads, we sure will get / a lesson that no one will forget / Praise Him and exalt Him above all.
Unhappy was the king, when he got to know / that Shadrach, Meshach, and Abed-Nego / to his orders, they all said no / Praise Him and exalt Him above all.
He said in the fire, they will be thrown / and everywhere it will be known / that no one disobeys the throne / Praise Him and exalt Him above all.
Seven times hotter, the fire was lit / no one could survive for one minute / those who threw them, were burned by it. / Praise Him and exalt Him above all.
The three youths did together pray / that their faith will always stay / willing to die for God that day / Praise Him and exalt Him above all.
Azarias felt the Lord's hand / will help their body, the pain to stand / they will not stray in a foreign land / Praise Him and exalt Him above all.
The Fourth that strengthened Hananiah / would let the harm of the fire pass / the fire will have no aftermath / Praise Him and exalt Him above all.
Likewise, also Mishael / praised the Lord Immanuel / the body may die, but the soul will heal / Praise Him and exalt Him above all.
The Angel came and the fire was tame / there was no more power in the flame / the might of nature obeys His name / Praise Him and exalt Him above all.
The fiery furnace would not dare / even to touch or burn their hair / God stood by them wherever they were / Praise Him and exalt Him above all.
The king from what he did was sad / great hopes for the three youths, he had / from what was happening, he was mad / Praise Him and exalt Him above all.
In his heart, he wished them well / but how could they in a fiery hell / escape from burning, who can tell / Praise Him and exalt Him above all.
The king was astonished to see four / instead of three, there were before / and said how come I see one more / Praise Him and exalt Him above all.
The three were loose, the king could see / the fourth like the Son of God was He / all this he said is strange to me / Praise Him and exalt Him above all.
They said our God is greater than all / for He created every body and soul / on His protection, we always call / Praise Him and exalt Him above all.
The king was happy that the youths were brave / to his orders, they would not cave / their God sent an Angel to save / Praise Him and exalt Him above all.
The king, for the youths, made a decree / no one with them dare disagree / worshipping their God, they would be free / Praise Him and exalt Him above all.
Hate for the three youths was halted / worshipping their God was not faulted / the name of the Lord was exalted / Praise Him and exalt Him above all.
As they obeyed and followed the Lord / and did not worship silver or gold / even the hot furnace became cold / Praise Him and exalt Him above all.
Praise the Lord, all you nations / exalt Him in the congregations / from now and unto all generations / Praise Him and exalt Him above all.
Praise your God, O Shadrach / Abed-Nego and honored Meshach / from all dangers, He brought you back / Praise Him and exalt Him above all.
The Chaldeans wanted your eradication / God guarded you from desolation / and saved you from annihilation / Praise Him and exalt Him above all.
Let every nation raise their voice / the Savior is our only choice / in His glorious wonders, we rejoice / Praise Him and exalt Him above all.
We, the Church, admire you so / your courage helps our faith to grow / Shadrach, Meshach, and Abed-Nego. / Praise Him and exalt Him above all.
